name: GuluGuluLand3D
description:
This is a 3D game in the style of classic action games from the NES era.
Unity, controlled by the player, keeps running and cannot stop. The player must use various actions to clear the stage, such as grabbing a stick with one hand to turn, grabbing a stick with both hands to jump, and so on.
The condition to clear a stage is to pass through all the places set for each stage.
You can increase your score by picking up coins, defeating enemies, and clearing the stage as quickly as possible. Aim for the Top 10 ranking for each stage.
There are 50 stages with a lot of variety.
